name: HolyChowBot
skdetail:

Invocation Name: holy chow
Developer Terms of Use
des: This Alexa skill allows you to ask questions about Holy Chow kosher Chinese takeout. Ask me things like "What are your store hours?" and "Which items on your menu are gluten free?". We will be adding more features over the next couple weeks and months so check back regularly to find out what's new.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
